text: Maramdi mateng pangbada nakhoina thawai yaojaba adu eina khang-i, aduga Achaia lamdamda leiriba thajaba ichil-inaosing nakhoina mamanggi chahidagi houna pinanabagidamak thourang toukhre haina Macedonia-gi misingda haiduna makhoigi mamangda eina nakhoigidamak chaothokchei. Asumna nakhoigi thawai yaojaba aduna makhoi ayambabu thougatle.
